pli-tv-pvr1.15:1.1: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.15:1.2: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṃ samathānaṃ tīhi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr1.15:2.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammati?
pli-tv-pvr1.15:2.2: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṃ samathānaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati—
pli-tv-pvr1.15:2.3: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena cāti. #2
